translation.en: [man 2] So what do you think, Joe?
I don’t know.
translation.ja: さあ 俺には分からない

translation.en: I don’t think that’s for me to say.
A second chance?
I mean, it’s a nice idea, but...
But?
-How do you feel? -Feel?
translation.ja: 気分はどうだ？ 気分？

translation.en: I feel that I was a nightmare.
I made terrible choices. I drove my family away. I--
translation.ja: ひどい選択をして 家族と疎遠になり⸺

translation.en: I hurt people.
I didn’t mean to, but there it is.
translation.ja: そんなつもりはなかったが

translation.en: And for all that...
there’s a hole inside me now. It hurts. I carry it.
translation.ja: 心に穴が開き 苦しみに さいなまれてる

translation.en: Like Phil Coakley hurts?
translation.ja: 君に刺された フィル･コークリーと同様？

translation.en: Of course not.
But I know the work I’ve done. You’ve seen that.
Yeah.
-Yeah. I have. -Right.
I got almost six years.
That’s real. That’s clarity.
translation.ja: 俺は必死に頑張ってきた

translation.en: I can’t do anything about before. That’s done.
translation.ja: 過去は変えられないが⸺

translation.en: But I can show people I’ve changed.
Like with my behavior.
And my girls.
I can be their father again.
And that’s what you want?
That’s all there is.
A second chance.
Why not?
I have faith in you, Joe.
-Thank you, Morris. -[door buzzes]
[guard] Let’s go.
Would you like to take communion before you go?
Oh, no. I’m good.
[cabdriver] Yeah.
-[Joe] Keep the change. -Thanks.
translation.ja: 釣りはいい どうも

translation.en: [man] Mother’s got her soup line today late.
translation.ja: 母さんは炊き出しの手伝いだ

translation.en: I think we expected to see you next week.
-Ah, she’d have meant to be here. -It’s okay.
Well, she’d have meant to be here.
translation.ja: 母さんは迎えたかっただろう

translation.en: -[Joe] Wait. Here. -[grunts]
Retired, huh?
Yeah. I couldn’t hump the lines anymore.
translation.ja: ああ　もう体力の限界でね

translation.en: Look, uh, you know, such a long trip up there
translation.ja: 刑務所は遠かったから 運転はキツい

translation.en: and my back being what it is.
-I know. -Still, we should have.
translation.ja: ああ 面会に行けなくて悪かった

translation.en: -I just, uh-- -I know.
translation.ja: 面会に行けなくて悪かった 分かってる

translation.en: They brought some of your stuff back when they closed your apartment. It’s downstairs in your space if you wanna--
translation.ja: お前のアパートにあった 荷物は地下室に置いてある

translation.en: Sure.
Hey, baby.
I missed you too.
[automated voice] The number you’ve reached is not in service--
-[Joe] Where’d they move to? -[man] We don’t know.
We haven’t spoken to Elaine since you went up.
translation.ja: お前の逮捕以来 会ってない

translation.en: [Joe] What about the girls? Birthdays? Christmas?
We are not in touch anymore.
translation.ja: もう連絡を取ってない

translation.en: -You never called? -She wouldn’t accept ’em.
translation.ja: 電話は？ 拒否されてた

translation.en: Well, she’s not obligated to.
translation.ja: 出る義務はないからな

translation.en: The settlement was clear--
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I contested that fucking settlement.
translation.ja: 俺は合意した覚えはない

translation.en: A clean break now, Joe, while the girls are young.
translation.ja: 娘たちが小さいうちに 離れるべきだ

translation.en: It’s a shame, but maybe she’s right.
translation.ja: 残念だがエレインは正しい

translation.en: Can I borrow the truck?
-Your mother will be home-- -Dad.
translation.ja: 母さんが… 頼む ６年ぶりに外に出たんだ

translation.en: I’ve been indoors six years. Please.
translation.ja: 頼む ６年ぶりに外に出たんだ

translation.en: [girl] Hello?
Melissa?
Yeah?
It’s Daddy, sweetie.
It’s your dad.
My dad?
Uh-huh.
How are you, baby?
Hmm. Good.
How’s your sister?
She’s okay.
That’s great.
Um, you know, I--
translation.ja: ずっと会えなかったが⸺

translation.en: I’ve been away because... Well, I had to be away.
translation.ja: ずっと会えなかったが⸺ 離れてたのは パパのせいじゃない

translation.en: It wasn’t my fault.
translation.ja: 離れてたのは パパのせいじゃない

translation.en: Well, it was, but I was sick and...
translation.ja: いや… つまり 病気だったんだ

translation.en: But now-- now I’m better, see, and we--
translation.ja: でも⸺ もうよくなった

translation.en: Can you hold on?
Melissa. Melissa, wait. Wait. I love you.
translation.ja: メリッサ　愛してるよ

translation.en: [woman] Joe?
Hey, sweetie.
How did you get this number?
I know. I just wanted to talk to the girls.
translation.ja: 娘たちと話したかった

translation.en: Joe, you know that’s not allowed.
-I should be able to speak to my-- -Listen to me.
translation.ja: 俺は父親だぞ 調停での合意に違反してる

translation.en: You’re violating your agreement.
translation.ja: 調停での合意に違反してる

translation.en: Agreement?
-You call again... -Why are you-- ...I’ll press charges.
translation.ja: 今度 電話したら訴える

translation.en: Well, this is--
Joe’s such a bad boy.
-[man] Sucker. -[Joe] Sorry. Sorry.
Joe motherfuckin’ Denton.
-Shit. Scotty. Look at you. -Look at you.
translation.ja: スコッティ　元気そうだ あんたも

translation.en: Goddamn. It’s good to see you.
Uh, get one, and put that on mine.
translation.ja: それは俺につけてくれ

translation.en: -That’s kind of you, man. Cheers. -Oh, it’s the least I can do.
translation.ja: 悪いな １杯ぐらい おごらせてくれ

translation.en: It’s the least I can do, man.
translation.ja: １杯ぐらい おごらせてくれ

translation.en: I figure you and Billy were-- you were like brothers,
translation.ja: 弟のビルは⸺ あんたと兄弟同然だった

translation.en: so that makes us like brothers, so...
translation.ja: あんたと兄弟同然だった

translation.en: -Hey. -To bein’ home.
And to my brother Billy.
To home and to Billy.
I-- I just-- I wanted to say hey, welcome you back.
translation.ja: とにかく 戻ってこられて よかったな

translation.en: If you need anything...
-Thanks, man. Good to see ya. -Give me a call.
You know, I come in here a lot, and I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen you before.
translation.ja: この店にはよく来るけど 見ない顔だわ

translation.en: I’m new.
-New used, maybe. -Mm-hmm.
But it’s what’s under the hood that counts. -Yep. -Right?
translation.ja: でも大事なのは中身よ

translation.en: Not the paint job. The ride is just so--
I get it. Cars.
Enjoyable.
Do you, uh...
wanna buy me a Sucker Punch?
translation.ja: サッカーパンチおごって

translation.en: Oh, boy.
I don’t know what that is.
Drinks.
[woman] Hey!
[Joe] Hey.
-[woman] Now what? -[laughs]
No. No.
No, I, uh-- I gotta go home.
Are you sure?
Yeah.
That’s boring. Wanna give me a ride home at least?
translation.ja: つまんないの せめて家まで送って

translation.en: Please.
Pretty please?
Pretty, pretty please?
[Joe] You sure this is the right way?
Yeah. It’s, uh, straight down there.
translation.ja: ええ　この道を真っすぐよ

translation.en: It’s right over there.
Okay.
You know...
...I thought you were gonna try something with me.
-I’m just giving you a lift. -Hmm.
You didn’t ask my name.
What’s your name?
-[thunder rumbling] -Cara.
Cara Coakley, you motherfucker.
translation.ja: カーラ･コークリーよ よくもパパを

translation.en: Help! Somebody help me!
Coffee?
I’d say it’s good to see you again, but I feel sick just being this close.
translation.ja: こんなに早く再会するとはな

translation.en: -Nice to see you too, Dan. -Lieutenant Pleasant.
translation.ja: やあ ダン 気安く呼ぶな プレザント警部補だ

translation.en: Don’t you dare use the informal with me, you fucking degenerate.
translation.ja: 気安く呼ぶな プレザント警部補だ

translation.en: You’re an everlasting disgrace to this department,
and if Officer Barnett wasn’t here, I would tune you up myself on general principle.
translation.ja: バーネット巡査がいなけりゃ 殴り倒してる

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
Did Manny Vassey or any of his animals visit you inside?
translation.ja: マニー･バッシーか 奴の手下が面会に来たか？

translation.en: Was it worth it, selling your soul to them?
translation.ja: 悪に堕(お)ちた価値があったか？

translation.en: You Judas fuck.
Where’s the DA? Isn’t he coming?
translation.ja: フィル･コークリー検事は 来ないのか？

translation.en: Look, Phil, this is not how I want--
translation.ja: フィル こんな再会になるとは…

translation.en: One of those young men is in intensive care.
The one with the nunchakus?
His father is an alderman.
I don’t give a shit if they’re astronauts.
Charge me.
Put those assholes on the stand and watch ’em come apart like wet bread,
translation.ja: 彼らが証言台で 無様な姿をさらすだけだ

translation.en: because you know exactly what this is.
They’re parked in the middle of nowhere with ninja weapons,
translation.ja: 奴らが武器を持ち 待ち伏せしてた場所で⸺

translation.en: precisely where and when their girlfriend happens to get assaulted?
translation.ja: 奴らが武器を持ち 待ち伏せしてた場所で⸺ たまたま女友達が襲われた？ あり得ない

translation.en: Come on. Be serious.
translation.ja: たまたま女友達が襲われた？ あり得ない

translation.en: Now, your daughter built herself a cute little frame,
translation.ja: あんたの娘は 立派に成長したな

translation.en: but there’s no way this ends in anything but a civil suit that buys me your fucking house.
translation.ja: だが訴訟を起こしても 負けるのはそっちだ

translation.en: [Phil] You’re right.
I spoke with Cara just now. She’s, uh, quite shaken by what happened.
translation.ja: カーラと話したが 心底おびえてたよ

translation.en: She’s been, uh, angry lately.
translation.ja: あの子は⸺ ずっと怒ってた

translation.en: She, uh...
Do you wish to press charges?
translation.ja: この件で彼らを告訴するか？

translation.en: In light of the statement given by my--
Cara, regarding the events of this evening...
translation.ja: カーラからすべて聞いた

translation.en: you have the right to press criminal battery charges against the men who attacked you,
translation.ja: 襲ってきた者たちを 君が暴行罪で訴えるなら⸺

translation.en: -and my office will issue arrest warrants. -[Joe] Hmm.
Ah, forget it. It’s in the past.
translation.ja: いいさ　過去は水に流そう

translation.en: Phil.
If I could change what happened, I would.
translation.ja: 起きたことは変えられないが

translation.en: But I paid my time.
I just want everything to stay in the past.
translation.ja: 過去は忘れて前に進みたい

translation.en: Like you want Billy Caldwell to stay in the past?
translation.ja: ビルを過去に葬ったように？

translation.en: You’re batting zero, shithead.
Goddamn, I miss high school.
I just passed a kid in the lot molesting his girlfriend in the backseat of his ’82 Datsun.
translation.ja: そこの駐車場の車内で カップルがイチャついてた

translation.en: Kind of impressed that Phil’s kid went for hard stuff like that.
translation.ja: フィルの娘は大したタマだ

translation.en: She always seemed like kind of a flake to me.
translation.ja: 信用ならんと思ってた

translation.en: But then the mother did leave after the, uh-- [whooshing]
translation.ja: まあ 母親が出ていったうえ お前がフィルを…

translation.en: So that’s gotta be kind of rough.
You look like you lost a little weight. Usually all that starchy food they--
translation.ja: 少し痩せたな ムショの食事は…

translation.en: What’s up, Dan?
How’s that for manners after all I’ve done for you?
translation.ja: それが恩人への態度か？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Hey. Six years in county beats 12 years in the state house.
translation.ja: 州刑務所で12年を 郡刑務所で６年にした

translation.en: Those boys down there would’ve spread you out like my crazy aunt’s quilt.
translation.ja: 州刑務所だったら 今頃 生きてないぞ

translation.en: Yeah, that was Manny’s grease, not yours.
translation.ja: マニーの賄賂のおかげだ

translation.en: -Speaking of the king... -[can hits bench]
-I didn’t ask for this. -So give it back.
translation.ja: 頼んでない なら返せ

translation.en: You heard about Manny?
What?
Cancer.
In the butt. Matter of time now.
translation.ja: 肛門のな じき死ぬ

translation.en: Well, he had a good run. Junior can steer things now.
translation.ja: ジュニアが後を継ぐだろ

translation.en: Nothin’ to do with me.
-Clean slate, huh? -Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: 手を切ったと？ そうだ

translation.en: Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re on the hook here, Joey.
translation.ja: 残念だが⸺ まだ切れてない

translation.en: Manny’s gotta go.
You--
You said cancer.
Before then. Now. Yesterday.
translation.ja: 病気で死ぬのを待てん

translation.en: Fuck are you talking about?
That old-time religion. Old man’s found God.
translation.ja: マニーは宗教に目覚め 救いを求めて⸺

translation.en: Cravin’ salvation by way of confession.
Bullshit. He’d never flip.
Old Manny wouldn’t, but dying’s made him smaller.
translation.ja: 昔のマニーならな だが今は弱ってる

translation.en: So let’s consider now specifically the kinds of things that he might confess to.
translation.ja: ざんげで何を 告白するか分からん

translation.en: Say, vis-à-vis, you.
translation.ja: お前の話もするかもな

translation.en: Yeah. Now you’re seein’ it.
You think Phil’s comment about Bill Caldwell was coincidental?
translation.ja: ビルの名を出したのは 偶然だと？

translation.en: -Manny’s talking to Phil? -Crazy, right?
translation.ja: マニーが話した？ イカれてるだろ？

translation.en: First he wants Phil hit, then his asshole’s melting and he wants to give him absolution.
translation.ja: お前に殺させようとした男に ざんげして⸺

translation.en: Christ forgives. The sinner is saved. All of that.
translation.ja: 許しを得ようとしてる

translation.en: Phil’s nudging him towards a deposition, and if he lives long enough, a grand jury.
translation.ja: マニーの供述を元に 大陪審が開かれる

translation.en: But even if not, you’d be inside so fast, your bunk would still be warm. And no favors this time.
translation.ja: お前はムショに逆戻り 今度は誰も守っちゃくれん

translation.en: What do we do?
“We”? You got a turd in your pocket?
You know, Phil’s been trying to butt-fuck you since forever, and if Manny sings, he can do it.
translation.ja: フィルは お前を恨み 復讐する気だ

translation.en: And if you do get keistered, I’d worry I’m next in line, and let me tell you what ain’t gonna happen.
translation.ja: お前が捕まって 俺のことをチクったら…

translation.en: If I was gonna roll over, wouldn’t I do that before serving my fucking time?
translation.ja: チクるなら ムショに入る前にやってる

translation.en: -I did the job they wanted-- -No, half the job. Semantics.
translation.ja: 俺は命令されて… だが殺せてない

translation.en: -Fuck you. I took the fall. -[engine starts]
You be sure and send her some flowers now, son.
translation.ja: 花でもプレゼントしろ

translation.en: The point is, you left Phil breathing all those years ago, or it wouldn’t be a problem now. The way I see it, it’s your mess.
translation.ja: この事態は お前がフィルを 始末し損ねたせいだ

translation.en: But hey, I’m more into carrots than sticks, so...
translation.ja: だが うまくやれば 褒美をやろう

translation.en: let’s talk about your girls instead.
translation.ja: お前の娘たちのことだ

translation.en: Junior high by now, hmm?
Family court judge by the name of Winthrop
translation.ja: 家庭裁判所の ウィンスロップ判事が⸺

translation.en: found himself “over-served” one evening a while back.
translation.ja: 家庭裁判所の ウィンスロップ判事が⸺ 少し前に飲酒運転した

translation.en: And he dented up the front of his Prius with the skull of an address-free citizen.
translation.ja: ホームレスをはねて 車に傷をつけたが⸺

translation.en: You might say I helped him sweep that up.
And I know that he would fall all over himself doing me a favor in return.
translation.ja: 彼なら俺の頼みを 聞いてくれるはずだ

translation.en: Like revising your custody deal, for instance,
translation.ja: 例えば親権の変更とか

translation.en: so you can see your daughters again.
What am I thinking? I gotta drive.
Manny goes. You get your girls back. That’s the carrot.
translation.ja: マニーを消せば 娘を取り戻せる

translation.en: The stick? Who wants to think about that?
translation.ja: 断るなら… 考えたくもないね　携帯だ

translation.en: Do it fast.
translation.ja: 考えたくもないね　携帯だ

translation.en: Answer me on that if I call.
-Don’t make me come after you. -[engine starts]
He lives.
Hi, Mom.
Oh, I guess you needed the rest. That’s okay.
translation.ja: あなたには休息が必要なのね

translation.en: -Is that a bruise? -Oh, no.
translation.ja: そのアザは？ ドアにぶつけただけだ

translation.en: That was there already. From a door.
translation.ja: ドアにぶつけただけだ 手伝うよ

translation.en: -You need a hand? -Nah. Makin’ soup.
[Joe groans] Hard time sleeping.
-Well, this is a big adjustment. -Mmm.
translation.ja: 随分 環境が変わったからね

translation.en: Give it time.
I’m sorry I wasn’t here when you arrived. I--
translation.ja: 昨日は留守で悪かったわ

translation.en: -I, uh-- I already told him. -It’s okay. It’s okay. [groans]
translation.ja: もう話したよ 気にしなくていい

translation.en: -Got our wires crossed, I guess. -Hmm.
-Sorry. Go ahead. -No, no, you first.
translation.ja: なあに？ 母さんから

translation.en: I was just wondering what are your plans for work.
translation.ja: 仕事はどうするつもりなの？

translation.en: [Joe] I haven’t been home a day yet.
It’s a reasonable question.
Your first night home and you’re out till dawn with your father’s truck.
translation.ja: 出所するなり 父さんの車で朝まで出かけた

translation.en: I just don’t want things going back to how they were.
translation.ja: 同じ過ちは犯さないで もう二度と

translation.en: Not here.
Dad says you don’t speak to your grandchildren.
translation.ja: 娘たちと会ってないそうだね

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] That’s Elaine’s decision.
We just want what’s best for them.
translation.ja: あの子たちにとって 最善の道だと

translation.en: What about me?
It’s impossible to you that I might have changed?
translation.ja: 俺が改心したとは 思えないのか？

translation.en: You know...
every Sunday in church...
translation.ja: 教会で毎週 日曜日に⸺

translation.en: I have to see Phil Coakley.
translation.ja: フィル･コークリーに会うの

translation.en: And everybody there sees me seeing him.
translation.ja: 私のことを みんなが見るわ

translation.en: Have you ever thought what that might feel like... to me?
translation.ja: 私が どんな気持ちでいるか 分かる？

translation.en: Have you changed?
You know what this is?
You expect me to be impressed ’cause you didn’t drink in jail?
translation.ja: 刑務所で 酒を断ったのが自慢？

translation.en: Dad! Come on!
Look, see, this is complicated.
No, it’s not.
You say you’ve changed. Good. I hope it’s true. I’ve prayed for it long enough.
translation.ja: 本当に改心したのなら 喜ばしいことよ

translation.en: I’m happy you’re home, and I love you,
translation.ja: 愛する息子の出所もうれしい

translation.en: but you don’t get extra points for doing what’s simply required, what everybody else does.
translation.ja: でも当然のことをして 褒められると思わないで

translation.en: -I can’t believe this shit. -You have work to do, Joe!
translation.ja: 勘弁しろよ まっとうな人間になって

translation.en: I am profoundly sorry, Phil.
translation.ja: 心から申し訳なく思うよ フィル

translation.en: Bill Caldwell. Billy was my friend. And I just wish he’d-- he’d...
translation.ja: ビル･コールドウェルは 俺の友人だった

translation.en: worked the steps.
Hi, Phil.
I was out of line, the way I spoke to you last night.
translation.ja: ゆうべはすまなかった

translation.en: I thought about this a lot,
what I wanted to say to you when I finally saw you, and that wasn’t it.
translation.ja: あんたと再会した時に 何と言うべきかを

translation.en: What I did wanna say was that I am profoundly sorry.
translation.ja: 心からの謝罪の気持ちを 伝えたかった

translation.en: I was truly in fear for my life.
translation.ja: 言い訳にはならないが

translation.en: I felt I was defending myself, but that doesn’t excuse the--
translation.ja: 本当に命の危険を感じて 身を守ろうと必死だった

translation.en: I don’t even remember it. Insane.
-Which is it? -Which?
You were in fear for your life or you don’t remember.
translation.ja: 必死だったのか 記憶がないのか

translation.en: Which is it?
The point is, I do take responsibility,
translation.ja: 罪を認めると言いたいんだ

translation.en: and I’m ready to move ahead with a-- with a clean life, a good life.
translation.ja: 前を向き まっとうに生きていく

translation.en: Take responsibility and just--
You know. Amends.
You mentioned Bill Caldwell.
He was my friend. I loved him.
translation.ja: 彼は大好きな友人だった

translation.en: I just wish he’d gotten into the program like I have, worked the steps.
translation.ja: 俺みたいに断酒できてたら まだ生きてて⸺

translation.en: There’s a whole other world you can live in. He just didn’t know.
translation.ja: 新しい人生を歩めたはずだ

translation.en: You are within 100 yards of my home here.
translation.ja: 家から100メートル以内に 入ってる

translation.en: But I’m not interested in some chickenshit restraining order violation.
translation.ja: だが接近禁止令の違反に 興味はない

translation.en: For you, I want the needle.
translation.ja: お前には死刑宣告を 受けさせる

translation.en: -And I’m gonna get it. -Okay.
Okay.
“Anger eats the vessel.”
[man] I guess you heard, huh?
How’s he doing?
Can I, um--?
He took care of me in there.
Hey, Manny.
You’re on the same drugs as me.
-How you feeling? -Eh.
I’m working on my anger.
-What? -Oh, nothing.
That’s not something I thought I’d ever hear you say.
translation.ja: 意外なことを言ったからさ

translation.en: [chuckles] What’d it ever get me?
All this. Lots of things.
translation.ja: 豪華な家とか いろいろ

translation.en: Yeah, well, I don’t want ’em anymore.
translation.ja: もう わしには必要ない

translation.en: Dan gave me a bag.
-You did your bid. -Yeah.
But I blew the job.
And I warned you about the drinking and the drugs.
translation.ja: 酒と薬には気をつけろと 忠告したはずだ

translation.en: You did.
translation.ja: 忠告に従うべきだった

translation.en: I should’ve listened, but since I didn’t...
translation.ja: 忠告に従うべきだった だが無視した

translation.en: I guess I was expecting someone to clip me in there, -not pay me when I came out. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 始末されると思ったのに 金をもらうとは

translation.en: If you knew how much it cost
translation.ja: 減刑のための 賄賂に比べたら⸺

translation.en: to sell that imperfect self-defense line. [laughs]
translation.ja: 減刑のための 賄賂に比べたら⸺ ほんの はした金だ

translation.en: Manny, come on.
Yeah, I admit. I was angry about Phil.
translation.ja: 確かに わしは お前に腹を立てていた

translation.en: You blew our clean shot at him. Hmm.
translation.ja: フィルを殺し損ねたからな

translation.en: But since you’d already taken care of Billy...
translation.ja: だがビルの方は うまく処理してくれた

translation.en: even though he went over to them...
he was your boy.
So that meant something.
translation.ja: よく やり遂げたな

translation.en: I bet Junior disagreed, huh?
Yeah, well, Junior has a lot of--
a lot of different ideas about a lot of things.
translation.ja: わしと意見が 食い違うことが多い

translation.en: Funny you mention talking to Phil.
translation.ja: フィルに話したんだろ？

translation.en: -Give me that fuckin’ thing. I hurt. -In a sec.
translation.ja: それを返せ　苦しい うわさが流れてる

translation.en: Because what I hear,
there’s this notion floating now that maybe Billy wasn’t an accident.
translation.ja: “ビルは事故死じゃ なかったかも”と

translation.en: -There’s always talk. -Manny.
translation.ja: ただのうわさだ マニー

translation.en: Are you talking to the DA? Huh?
You know, sometimes when I’m sleeping...
translation.ja: わしは時々 夢で見るんだ

translation.en: I think I see what hell looks like...
and it ain’t fire and it ain’t devils.
translation.ja: そこには業火もなければ 悪魔もいない

translation.en: You know what it is?
It’s just me.
And I ain’t no goddamn stool pigeon.
translation.ja: わしは密告などしない

translation.en: I’m sorry. I don’t know. I...
translation.ja: 悪かった　俺はただ…

translation.en: It’s been a tough few days, is all.
translation.ja: ここ数日 キツくてね

translation.en: [Manny] Tough, yeah.
Tough for everybody.
[Joe] He nodded out. Pressed the thing there and just...
translation.ja: 薬で もうろうとして ボタンを押したらしい

translation.en: It’s the pain. We upped the dosage.
translation.ja: 鎮痛剤の量を増やしたの

translation.en: We should probably let him rest.
Of course. Of course.
I’m Joe.
Charlotte Boyd.
Old friend.
So how is he-- I mean, it’s bad, huh?
translation.ja: 容体は よくないんだろ？

translation.en: I’m a hospice worker.
Yeah, well, he’s a fighter.
translation.ja: そうか　彼はタフだ

translation.en: Charlotte?
Thank you for taking care of my friend.
translation.ja: 友人の世話をありがとう

translation.en: You’re gonna sit there with your stupid fuckin’ shirt and tell me I can’t see my own father? My kids can’t go?
translation.ja: おやじに会いに来たのに 外で待てだと？

translation.en: He just wants you to call first, Junior, that’s all.
translation.ja: 来る前に電話してくれ

translation.en: Oh, I see.
Did this cocksucker call first?
translation.ja: こいつは電話したのか？

translation.en: Hey, Junior.
-[boy] I thought we were gonna see Poppy. -[Joe] Wow.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんは？ 驚いた

translation.en: [Junior] Go inside and play the quiet game, okay?
Oh, man. You guys are so big.
translation.ja: すっかりデカくなったな

translation.en: [Junior] Hey, close that door behind you. The A/C’s on, all right?
translation.ja: ドアをきちんと閉めろよ

translation.en: -Goddamn, they grow so fast. -Yeah, how you doin’, Joe?
translation.ja: 大きくなって… 元気か？ ジョー

translation.en: Now, you lay there with your hands on your scrotum and you listen.
translation.ja: タマを押さえて 這(は)いつくばりながら聞け

translation.en: You are not welcome here.
This is a family time,
and this family no longer has any use for dumb-fuck, grief-causing policemen.
translation.ja: 間抜けなサツは お呼びじゃねえんだ

translation.en: Now, you come around here again bothering my father, disturbing his rest...
translation.ja: 今度 おやじに近寄って 安静を妨げたら⸺

translation.en: and I’m gonna bring you down to my playroom.
Yeah. You know what happens there.
translation.ja: どんな場所か知ってるな？

translation.en: -All right. Come on. Let’s get up. -[groaning]
I think we’d all feel better if you moved on.
translation.ja: もう関わらないでくれ

translation.en: Hey, Junior?
Any idea what Phil Coakley talks to your dad about?
translation.ja: フィル･コークリーと おやじさんは何の話を？

translation.en: Besides the Bible, I mean.
Now, why would you say something like that?
I mean, all these years my father carries your crazy ass,
translation.ja: 長年 おやじに 世話になっといて⸺

translation.en: you’re implying he’s some kind of rat or something?
All right. Yo, break this motherfucker’s mouth.
Hi.
Uh, can I have a coffee, please?
Thank you.
Hello.
Oh, hi.
Here.
Thank you.
No, thank you for taking care of my friend.
You said that already.
Are you from Bradley originally?
I moved from Montreal around two years ago.
translation.ja: 出身はモントリオールよ

translation.en: -You got family? -No.
I-- Well, uh, no.
Do you work there every day at Manny’s house?
-Six days a week usually. -Hmm. Wow.
translation.ja: 週６日 通ってる じゃあ彼の家の 薬や機器は⸺

translation.en: And all of his-- I don’t know--
translation.ja: じゃあ彼の家の 薬や機器は⸺

translation.en: uh, medication and monitoring and all that, that’s all you?
translation.ja: じゃあ彼の家の 薬や機器は⸺ 全部 君が管理してるのか？

translation.en: That’s me. And another girl. We do split shifts.
translation.ja: ええ　もう１人と交代でね

translation.en: Wow. That must feel like a big responsibility.
translation.ja: すごいな　責任重大だ

translation.en: I guess it is. I don’t feel overwhelmed.
No?
But I’m good at helping people.
I guess your agency provides you with supplies and medication and whatnot for there at the house.
translation.ja: 薬や機器は君の事務所から 支給されてるのか？

translation.en: My father had lymphoma.
And... [sighs] They had him on so much different stuff there.
translation.ja: ありとあらゆる薬を 大量に投与された

translation.en: At the end...
he didn’t know what day it was.
-I’m sorry. It’s a terrible disease. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 気の毒に　大変な病気よ

translation.en: Actually, I just moved back here myself.
translation.ja: 俺は最近 町に戻り⸺

translation.en: Everyone’s gone now.
I was, uh, doing some consulting-- -[spits] -Whoa.
translation.ja: コンサルティングの仕事を…

translation.en: -What the fuck? -Sergeant Thom Doyle,
translation.ja: 何だ？ 私は引退した巡査部長 トム･ドイルだ

translation.en: retired, IUPA local.
translation.ja: 私は引退した巡査部長 トム･ドイルだ

translation.en: And you, sir, are a worthless goddamn punk.
translation.ja: 貴様は救いようのないクズだ

translation.en: I think I’m gonna skip this one.
Do you think you might wanna get together again?
Like I said, everyone’s gone now, and...
translation.ja: 今は知り合いもいないし⸺

translation.en: I like you.
You know, if you want, I could set you up with Toni.
translation.ja: トニが気に入ったなら⸺

translation.en: Little, uh, welcome-home toss?
You know we take care of cops here.
Hell, your old buddy, he’s on a weekly.
translation.ja: あんたの仲間は週１で来てる

translation.en: [man] Come on. Come on. What’s wrong? Hey!
Bruno. Fuck. Get that fucker out of here.
translation.ja: ブルーノ　つまみ出せ

translation.en: All right, come on.
Get the fuck out.
-Who’s the peacock? -It’s her old man.
translation.ja: あれは？ トニの亭主さ

translation.en: They got this whole jealousy thing going.
Anyway, if you wanna spend some time with Toni, it’s on me.
translation.ja: 店のおごりだ トニとヤるか？

translation.en: -Pass. -Suit yourself.
Hey, you want any, uh--? [snorts]
Oh, no, thanks.
Oh, yeah.
[man on TV] Marion Barry tonight delegated many of his duties as mayor of the nation’s capital but did not resign.
translation.ja: バリー知事は大半の職務を 委譲しましたが辞職はせず

translation.en: The word of this came hours after the DC mayor was brought before a federal magistrate--
translation.ja: 連邦裁判所に 出廷したのちの声明で…

translation.en: Excuse me.
That is not your vehicle.
Oh, Dad-- Dad said it was fine.
Where have you been all day? And why are you rushing in like this?
translation.ja: 一日中どこで何してたの？

translation.en: For your information, I went to a meeting.
translation.ja: 依存症の集まりに行ってた

translation.en: -Where? -What?
Where was the meeting you were at?
I-- It’s anonymous, Mom.
We’re not gonna do things like this. I’m telling you right now.
translation.ja: 勝手なことは許さないわ

translation.en: -I’m doing everything I can! -All right, okay.
translation.ja: 俺も努力してる 落ち着け

translation.en: I wish I could believe you, Joe, but you make it so hard.
translation.ja: あなたの話は信じられない

translation.en: No. You make it so hard, because you don’t want to believe in me.
translation.ja: 俺のことを 信用してないからだ

translation.en: I said “believe,” not “believe in.”
translation.ja: 信用できるはずがない

translation.en: -[Joe] See? -Now, listen.
The onus is on you.
What difference does it make when you’re determined to judge me?
translation.ja: 頭ごなしに非難するな

translation.en: Could I have some support here, please?
Oh, no, wait, wait. Mom.
Fuck it. I’ll be gone soon anyway.
What’s that supposed to mean?
This behavior is precisely why you lost your family, Joseph!
translation.ja: そういう態度が原因で 家族を失ったのよ

translation.en: -Would you like another one? -No, thanks.
What?
Thank you. For asking me here.
translation.ja: 誘ってくれて どうもありがとう

translation.en: I don’t usually-- And... [sighs]
translation.ja: 普段あまり出かけないから

translation.en: Feels nice.
Like I said, I like you.
Me too.
So, Montreal.
translation.ja: モントリオール出身か

translation.en: What prompted the move south?
Polarity. [clears throat] Weather systems.
translation.ja: さあ 気候が違うから？

translation.en: -Why does anyone do anything? -I don’t know.
translation.ja: 特に理由はないわ そうか

translation.en: Do you ever feel like you’re living in the wrong skin?
translation.ja: 自分に違和感を 抱いたことは？

translation.en: Sometimes I’ll wake up in the middle of the night
translation.ja: 時々 真夜中に目覚めて⸺

translation.en: and I’ll go to get a glass of water,
translation.ja: 時々 真夜中に目覚めて⸺ 水を１杯飲む

translation.en: and I’ll just catch myself in the mirror, and I don’t recognize myself at all.
translation.ja: 水を１杯飲む 鏡に映る姿が 他人みたいに思えるの

translation.en: It’s like someone else has come into my bathroom and just stood there.
translation.ja: 知らない人が そこに立ってるみたい

translation.en: Does that ever happen to you?
Sure.
-[salsa playing] -Do you--?
Oh, yeah.
I-- [clears throat] I’m just gonna go... Do you-- Do you want a drink or something?
translation.ja: 少し待ってて 自由に飲んでてちょうだい

translation.en: Okay. And you?
Yes.
Just...
Okay.
I like your place.
It’s what I have.
-Cheers. -[clinking]
Why me?
’Cause you’re good.
[Joe] I think everything happens for a reason, you know?
translation.ja: すべての出来事には 意味がある

translation.en: Like what?
Meeting you.
-[chuckles] -No, really. I--
I’ve been having kind of a hard time.
translation.ja: 俺はつらい日々を送ってた

translation.en: Just alone, you know?
Things... just f-feel different now.
translation.ja: でも今は 感じ方が変わってきた

translation.en: -Hmm. -Hope that’s not weird to say.
[sighs] Anyways, so, yeah.
Do you have any other clients? Other than Manny, I mean.
translation.ja: マニー以外にも 誰かの世話を？

translation.en: I noticed you had, I don’t know, looked like, uh... -[sighs] -...pharmaceuticals or something in there.
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫の中に 薬があるのを見た

translation.en: The reason I ask is because, before I moved back, one of the firms I was consulting for had this guy--
translation.ja: 実は町に戻る前に コンサルティングしてた…

translation.en: Oh, Joe.
No, it’s true. He was-- Really--
Really? “Consulting”?
You were in jail.
It was in the paper. Your picture was in the paper.
translation.ja: 写真入りで新聞に載ってたわ

translation.en: “Slash Cop,” it said, which just is...
translation.ja: “切り裂き魔の警官”と 見出しが

translation.en: What happened?
[sighs] Didn’t you read it?
I’m asking you.
I was very drunk. Um--
Coming home from a place downtown.
Apparently I bumped into him, the lawyer.
translation.ja: あの検事と 鉢合わせしたらしい

translation.en: And, uh--
There was a fight, and I hurt him. Badly.
translation.ja: 揉めて 重傷を負わせた

translation.en: -It said you had a knife. -I thought he was gonna--
translation.ja: ナイフで？ 暗かったし 身の危険を感じた

translation.en: It was dark, and I-I-I, um--
translation.ja: 暗かったし 身の危険を感じた

translation.en: If you knew...
translation.ja: 知ってたのに なぜ？

translation.en: Because I know what it means to need a second chance.
translation.ja: ２度目のチャンスは 与えられるべきよ

translation.en: And I didn’t know you when you did those things.
translation.ja: 昔のあなたは関係ない

translation.en: I know you now.
-[phone beeps] -Hello?
[Dan on phone] Didn’t wake your girl, did I?
I was hoping I would’ve heard some sort of “In Memoriam” item by now about our mutual patron.
translation.ja: 共通の友人の訃報は まだ耳に入ってこないぞ

translation.en: I fucking tried. Junior was there.
translation.ja: ジュニアに邪魔された

translation.en: -Whoa. -Yeah, exactly.
I can’t get that close again. If anything other than cancer happens to Manny, I’ll be the first one he comes after.
translation.ja: もう近寄れないし 何かあれば俺が疑われる

translation.en: Figure it out. [exhales] Put in some work instead of gettin’ your dick wet.
translation.ja: 女とヤる暇があるなら 手を考えろ

translation.en: I was working. She’s the nurse there.
translation.ja: 考えてる 彼女はマニーの看護師だ

translation.en: -Oh. Good thinkin’. -Yeah. Except that won’t work either.
translation.ja: なるほど だがダメだ

translation.en: -Why not? -It just... won’t.
translation.ja: なぜ？ とにかく… ダメなんだ

translation.en: There’s no access. Trust me.
[sighs] All that matters is that there isn’t a case brought against you.
translation.ja: お前自身も ヤバい立場なんだぞ

translation.en: Phil is the only one eager to throw bombs, and everybody else knows that the Vasseys are good for business.
translation.ja: フィルはマニーを使って 悪事を暴こうとしてる

translation.en: So if you can’t clip Manny, clip the mutant.
translation.ja: マニーが無理なら フィルを消せ

translation.en: There’s no time left. Just make it look right, is all.
translation.ja: あまり時間がないぞ　急げ

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] Joe! Pick up the phone. It’s for you.
translation.ja: ジョー　出なさい あなたに電話よ

translation.en: Joe! Joe!
translation.ja: 聞いてるの？ ジョー

translation.en: -Yeah. -[man on phone] Joseph Denton?
translation.ja: はい ジョー･デントン？

translation.en: -Yeah. -This is Anthony Getman with the Bradley Post-Release Program. You have your office check-in and urinalysis appointment today.
translation.ja: 依存症更生プログラムの者だ 今日は尿検査の日だぞ

translation.en: -[sniffs] -Hello?
Yes, sir. I’ll be right there.
Fuck.
-[Scotty] Hello? -It’s Joe.
translation.ja: はい？ ジョーだ　助けてくれ

translation.en: -I need your help. -Who is it?
translation.ja: ジョーだ　助けてくれ 誰だ？

translation.en: Joe.
-Oh, hey, man. Come on up. -[door buzzes]
[Scotty] Seriously, Joe, it’s no problem.
Positive?
The, uh, reserves piss test randomly, so I, uh...
translation.ja: 軍の尿検査は無作為だから

translation.en: stick to booze.
-You can keep the cup. [chuckles] -[chuckling]
-Thanks, man. I owe ya. -No.
Hey, Joe, can I ask you something straight up?
Sure.
Back then was there ever any, uh--
I don’t know--
any talk about what happened to Billy maybe wasn’t an accident?
translation.ja: 事故死じゃなかったのか？

translation.en: I mean,
translation.ja: あいつは 飲んだくれだったが⸺

translation.en: we all know he was a lush, but falling asleep on the tracks?
translation.ja: あいつは 飲んだくれだったが⸺ 線路で寝るか？

translation.en: Wasn’t my case, but I knew the guys who drew it. They worked it right.
translation.ja: 担当の警官が きちんと捜査した

translation.en: Why, um...
Why now?
Phil Coakley called me. He wants me to come in.
translation.ja: フィル･コークリーに 呼び出された

translation.en: Mm-hmm. He say why?
He said they’re gonna impanel a grand jury and, uh, reopen it as a homicide.
translation.ja: 殺人事件として 大陪審で再審理させると

translation.en: Based on what?
“New information” is all he would say.
It’s like he wanted to dangle it in front of my face.
Fuckin’ prick.
Whatever Phil says he’s got, it’s smoke. He’s fishing.
translation.ja: フィルの話はデタラメだ

translation.en: He’s got a hard-on for the Vasseys. Always has.
translation.ja: マニーたちに恨みがあるのさ

translation.en: There was talk about Junior, maybe he’d been around the tracks that night.
translation.ja: ジュニアが近くにいたって 証言もあったが⸺

translation.en: But they could never back it up. It was what it was. A shitty accident, like you said.
translation.ja: 何の証拠もない あれは悲惨な事故だった

translation.en: I’m sorry, man.
I never liked Phil anyway.
I was glad when you fucked him up.
translation.ja: 切ってくれて感謝してる

translation.en: Thanks, man. All right.
Hey, buddy.
-Hey, fellas! -Hey, Dan!
Yeah, now he gets it.
Get it all out.
-Okay. -[retches] Up you go. Come on.
translation.ja: もういいだろ　立て

translation.en: This thing works pretty good, huh?
Now, I didn’t wake up in this mood.
I was thinking, “Don’t worry. My pal Joey will carry his water on this thing.”
translation.ja: “ジョーがやってくれる”と 信じてた

translation.en: But then I hear, uh, no.
This Caldwell grand jury is, uh, in motion after all.
translation.ja: 大陪審の準備が進んでる

translation.en: -I know. -Did I tell you time was short?
translation.ja: 知ってる 急げと言ったのに

translation.en: Did I tell you what was coming? And what did you do but fuck around.
translation.ja: のんきに女遊びしやがって

translation.en: I’ll just take my chances in court.
translation.ja: 法廷でうまく証言する

translation.en: Buddy, you know I wouldn’t be able to let you do that.
translation.ja: そんなことさせると思うか？

translation.en: Then I’ll run.
Well, that either. Do I need to recharge your battery?
translation.ja: ナメるな もう一度食らうか？

translation.en: F-Fu-- I can’t do Manny. I can’t do Phil. You name a third way or get the fuck out.
translation.ja: マニーもフィルも無理だ 逃げるしかない

translation.en: I just bought a new gas grill.
Stainless steel. Got an infrared system on it.
To be honest, I don’t even know what that means.
But if you think that I wouldn’t buy some crackhead nigger for 500 bucks to come into your parents’ house
translation.ja: 俺はいつでも その辺の 黒人を雇って⸺

translation.en: and slit their throat while they sleep...
if it meant that I got to keep that grill, you got me mixed up with somebody else.
translation.ja: グリルを買うよりも簡単にな

translation.en: Manny’s deposition is Monday morning.
translation.ja: マニーの宣誓供述は月曜日だ

translation.en: Thirty-six hours.
Now, you fix it before then, or I’ll assume that we’re at odds.
translation.ja: それまでに対処できなきゃ 終わりだ

translation.en: And then-- [huffs] goddamn, everything’s on the table.
translation.ja: そうなれば⸺ 容赦しないからな

translation.en: And I really do like your folks.
Kelley’s.
[Joe] Hey, it’s me.
Hey, hey, hey. How you feelin’ today?
translation.ja: どうした？ 元気にしてるか

translation.en: Do you know, I was thinking maybe I’d want to talk to Toni.
-You mentioned preferentials. -Yeah.
translation.ja: サツは優遇するんだろ？

translation.en: So you know when she sees Dan then? Or-- Or where?
translation.ja: トニはダンと いつどこで会う？

translation.en: Dan? I never mentioned Dan.
I was talking about Phil Coakley.
How else do you think that Frankenstein motherfucker’s getting any pussy?
translation.ja: あの傷痕だ 他じゃ女に相手されん

translation.en: [Joe] Where’d you meet him?
[Toni] English Garden Inn, off 68.
translation.ja: 68号線沿いのモーテル 〝ケリーの店 〞

translation.en: Same room or different room?
He had a retainer on number 27, on account of it’s a queen size.
translation.ja: 27号室よ ベッドがクイーンサイズなの

translation.en: -Can you get him to see you again? -I don’t wanna see him.
translation.ja: 呼び出せるか？ 会いたくない

translation.en: A grand.
Thousand dollars?
Cash. After.
[Joe] I think I can do it.
[Dan on phone] Good boy. Which one?
Neither.
I got a way to freeze Phil out. Nobody gets hurt.
translation.ja: フィルを脅して手を引かせる

translation.en: Oh, girl, did I knock a fuse loose?
translation.ja: 一体 何を言ってるんだ

translation.en: I can back him off. No grand jury, no Manny Vassey. It’s done.
translation.ja: 奴が手を引けば マニーも大陪審も関係ない

translation.en: You must have a hell of a wedge.
Bradley’s most saintly public official. Solicitation, on tape.
translation.ja: 清廉潔白な検事が 買春してる映像だ

translation.en: Ha! Is that real?
I’m looking at it.
I’ll be goddamned. Phil’s still got some gas in his tank after all.
translation.ja: 驚いたよ フィルはお盛んだな

translation.en: He is mighty precious about his reputation, but, still, blackmail’s messy, you ain’t careful.
translation.ja: 奴は評判を気にするからな だが恐喝は難しいぞ

translation.en: Nobody dies, Dan. It’s clean.
So long as it’s chilled.
It will be.
That’s my boy.
Thanks.
You seem different.
How’s that?
I don’t know.
Lighter.
Things are gonna work out.
Maybe they already have.
I’m gonna have a shower.
All right.
Yeah?
[Toni] I told him I’d see him again if he laid off the Jesus.
translation.ja: フィルを誘ってみたわ

translation.en: He damn near jumped through the phone.
Great. I’ll be right there.
-[knocking] -I’ll call you tonight!
[Charlotte] What?
[commercial announcer] Taurus is the car you’ve been waiting for.
translation.ja: これぞ皆が待ち望んでいた車

translation.en: Sleek, strong, safe.
translation.ja: 優美でパワフルかつ安全

translation.en: -♪ Taurus ♪ -Wow!
-[door slams open] -[man] Bitch, I knew it!
Police! Stay in your room!
translation.ja: 警察だ　部屋にいろ

translation.en: Shit!
No.
Joe.
I gotta talk to you.
All right.
I read this while you were inside.
translation.ja: お前の服役中に読んだ

translation.en: I didn’t know there was a name for it.
translation.ja: 「自己愛性人格障害への 理解」 そういう名前らしい 「自己愛性人格障害への 理解」

translation.en: I have always known since you were little...
translation.ja: お前が子供の頃から 気づいてた

translation.en: there was something in you.
And I didn’t do anything about it.
I’ve done a lot of soul-searching...
translation.ja: お前がそうなったのは⸺

translation.en: about my part in what happened to you.
-Dad, you didn’t do anything. -Let me finish.
translation.ja: 違うよ 最後まで聞け

translation.en: That’s what I’m saying.
I didn’t do anything.
I didn’t make you run with wild people.
translation.ja: お前が悪い連中とつるみ⸺

translation.en: I didn’t make you gamble all that money.
translation.ja: ギャンブルにハマっても

translation.en: I didn’t make you take drugs or drink liquor
translation.ja: ドラッグや酒に溺れても

translation.en: or be so goddamn angry all the time, Joe.
translation.ja: 常に腹を立ててても 何もしなかった

translation.en: I knew how you were. I did nothing to help.
translation.ja: お前と関わらなかった

translation.en: I am sorry, Joe.
For that I am truly sorry.
translation.ja: 心から申し訳なく思う

translation.en: But I’ve gotta do something about it now.
translation.ja: 今 その償いをしたい

translation.en: For your mother, for me...
translation.ja: 母さんや私のためにも⸺

translation.en: -[sighs] -...maybe for you. I don’t know.
But this cannot continue.
Give me the keys.
Dad...
Give me the keys.
Tomorrow morning. You’re gonna have to leave.
translation.ja: 明日の朝 この家から出ていけ

translation.en: Dad, I’m leaving right now.
Joe?
Where is it?
I will not have dirty money in my house.
translation.ja: 汚れたお金は うちに置けない

translation.en: It’s not dirty money. It’s my money.
translation.ja: 違う　あれは俺の金だ

translation.en: Who keeps that much money in a bag unless it’s dirty money?
translation.ja: まっとうな手段じゃ あんな大金 手に入らない

translation.en: You have no right to go through my stuff!
We have every right!
Where did it come from? Where?
What’s the difference? I’m leaving! You get your wish!
translation.ja: 関係ないだろ　もう出てく

translation.en: My wish is to have my son back.
translation.ja: 私は息子を取り戻したいの

translation.en: -All right-- -I don’t know who you are!
-[Joe’s dad] Take it easy, Joe. -Mom.
I’m going. Okay? I’m going.
But I need that bag.
-Mm-mmm. -I am dead without it. So where is it? Please.
translation.ja: なけりゃ死んじまう どこにやった？

translation.en: Please.
No. No!
No!
[Joe] What the fuck?
You... have been in touch this whole time?
translation.ja: ずっと娘たちと 連絡を取ってたのか？

translation.en: The best thing that ever happened to those girls was to get away from their father.
translation.ja: 父親から引き離すのが あの子たちのためよ

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] Remember, you had everything and you destroyed it all!
translation.ja: すべてを失ったのは 自分のせいよ

translation.en: -[Joe] Fuck you! -[Joe’s dad] Just stop!
[Joe] You’ll never hate me as much as I hate myself!
[Joe’s mom] Oh, no, you don’t!
You don’t get to turn this into a little pity party!
translation.ja: 自分を哀れむのは やめなさい

translation.en: This is beyond your little feelings!
[Joe] When did you ever care how I felt?
[Joe’s mom] That’s all I ever cared about! And I don’t hate you!
translation.ja: 気にかけてたわ あなたを愛してるの

translation.en: I hate what you’ve done to this family!
-Where’s the fucking money? -[gunshot]
[distorted] Joe! 911! Joe, call 911!
translation.ja: ジョー　救急車を呼べ！

translation.en: -[Joe’s mom] Oh! -Call 911, Joe!
-Oh, Jesus Christ, Joe! -Aaah!
translation.ja: 何てこった　ジョー！

translation.en: Dad?
Dad?
Who did it?
Junior Vassey or-or Dan Pleasant. I don’t know.
translation.ja: ジュニア･バッシーか ダン･プレザントか…

translation.en: Your friends.
You bring mayhem with you, Joe.
I fucked up.
[Joe] Then what happened was...
I got behind with my bookie.
translation.ja: ギャンブルで借金を負った

translation.en: It started slow, ya know, couple of Sundays of bad luck.
translation.ja: “ツイてなかった” 程度の負けが⸺

translation.en: Next thing I know, I’m underwater.
I kept thinking, “Aw, I’ll sort this out.”
[sniffs] “I’ll dig out from this. My daughters...
when they look at me, when they look at my face, they’ll forgive me.”
translation.ja: “娘たちも 俺を許してくれる”と

translation.en: Me and another cop... a guy named Dan...
translation.ja: 俺とダンという名の もう１人の警官が⸺

translation.en: we did whatever Manny said, and he said, “Do terrible things.”
translation.ja: マニーの命令を受けて ひどいことをやってた

translation.en: Now it-- It’s happening all over again.
translation.ja: その過去のツケが回ってきた

translation.en: He’s gonna talk about all that now, Manny is, and when he does...
translation.ja: マニーは洗いざらい話す気だ

translation.en: that prosecutor’s gonna give me the death penalty.
translation.ja: そうすれば俺は死刑になる

translation.en: [sniffs] Assuming Dan doesn’t kill me first.
translation.ja: ダンは俺の家族を殺す

translation.en: You don’t know that.
You don’t.
We’re not defined by our pasts.
translation.ja: 人は過去によって 決まるんじゃない

translation.en: You’ve remade yourself. You’ve chosen to be a good man.
translation.ja: 生まれ変わって いい人間になれる

translation.en: It’s a choice. That’s all it is.
In prison, uh, there was a chaplain.
Chaplain Morris.
And he sat with me for-- for fuckin’ years.
translation.ja: 何年も 俺に寄り添ってくれて⸺

translation.en: I’m tellin’ ya, if someone tells you for that long that you can be forgiven...
translation.ja: “君は許される”と ずっと言ってくれてた

translation.en: You’re the only one who made me feel like maybe he was right.
translation.ja: 彼は正しいと 君が思わせてくれた

translation.en: He was.
I need money to run.
-Let’s go. -[Joe] Hey, guys.
[Joe] I’m gonna go.
Big time.
But...
you’re gonna see the playroom first.
Junior, you don’t have to do this. I-- I swear I’m gonna leave.
translation.ja: 必要ない 俺はもう町から出るんだ

translation.en: What-Whatever Phil is gonna do with your Dad had--
translation.ja: 必要ない 俺はもう町から出るんだ フィルがマニーに…

translation.en: My dad?
My father... is dead.
translation.ja: 俺のおやじは死んだよ

translation.en: He was a great man. A king.
translation.ja: 偉大だった　まさに王だ

translation.en: And...
Well, they’ll never be another one like him, right, fellas?
translation.ja: あんな人は他にいない

translation.en: -Fuck yeah. -[thug] Hmm. [chuckles]
[stammers] Don’t, don’t! No!
Your girlfriend isn’t the most competent nurse I’ve ever seen.
translation.ja: お前の彼女は 有能な看護師だな

translation.en: Jesus Christ, you sound like she did. [laughs]
translation.ja: 彼女も同じ声を上げてた

translation.en: But don’t worry. You’ll see her again.
[Joe] Where is she?
Out there.
[Junior] We’re gonna go in there together, you and me.
We are gonna go down there and work it all out.
translation.ja: 時間はたっぷりあるから⸺

translation.en: [Junior] We got all day, don’t we?
There’s nothing to work out. Uh-- I didn’t do anything. It wasn’t me.
translation.ja: 話すことはない 俺は何もしてない

translation.en: That’s not what she said.
[Joe] We don’t have to do this. It wasn’t me.
-All right, come on. -[Joe] No. No!
-[thug speaks foreign language] -No. No. No, no, no!
translation.ja: よせ！ やめろ！ 離してくれ

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! No!
translation.ja: やめろ！ 離してくれ

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -No, no, no, no, no!
Who the fuck is this?
[Scotty] I’ll kill you, Junior!
[Scotty] Die, motherfucker!
[Scotty] I see you, Junior! I see you back there, bitch!
translation.ja: 逃げてもムダだぞ ジュニア！

translation.en: [Scotty laughs] There you go, Junior! There you go!
translation.ja: そこにいるのは分かってる

translation.en: [Scotty] Get some!
Get some!
Now, Bill is my brother!
[Junior] Suck my cock, you fuckin’ retard!
Fuck it.
[Scotty] Fuck, man.
[Scotty] Joe?
Hey, Joe.
[Joe] You hold on, okay? You just hold on.
Scotty, you hear me?
Yeah, yeah, I hear you.
Good.
You’re gonna be fine. -Getting you help. -Yeah?
’Cause... you were like a brother to Billy.
translation.ja: あんたはビルと仲がよかった

translation.en: That makes you like a brother to me, right?
translation.ja: だから俺の兄弟同然だ

translation.en: That’s right.
Except he didn’t fall on any fucking train tracks, did he?
translation.ja: ビルは線路でなんか 寝てなかっただろ？

translation.en: Not the way they said.
You... put him there.
That’s crazy, Scotty. Just--
We’re almost there, okay?
Junior... told you to do it.
translation.ja: ジュニアに命令されて⸺

translation.en: And you did it.
I talked to Phil about it, you know?
-He’s not such a bad guy. -Did you--
translation.ja: 案外 いい奴だ お前が⸺

translation.en: Did you maybe take a shot at my house, Scotty?
translation.ja: 俺の家を銃撃したのか？

translation.en: Yeah.
Sorry.
-[beeps] -Yeah.
You slick motherfucker, you.
Hey, Dan.
Thought you said your plan was “no bodies.”
translation.ja: 死人は出ないはずだろ？

translation.en: But I ain’t complainin’. You do some work on his brakes or what?
translation.ja: だが文句はよそう 奴の車に細工を？

translation.en: His what?
Phil’s car.
-Bitch, I knew it! -[screams]
Motherfucker.
[Dan] Got into a smashup last night. Went up in smoke.
You did it. You’re free.
translation.ja: やったな　お前は自由だ

translation.en: Now we’ll get started with the judge, get your girls back.
translation.ja: 判事に連絡して 娘と会わせてやる

translation.en: Yes, sir, a brand-new day, Joey. A brand-new day.
translation.ja: 新しいスタートだ　ジョー

translation.en: How is she?
She’s gonna live.
What are you doing?
I’m leaving.
What are you doing with that?
-You want it? -[scoffs]
-What are you doing with it? -I’m taking it to the girls.
translation.ja: 答えろ 娘たちに渡す

translation.en: -No, you’re not. -I’m not trying to buy them.
translation.ja: やめろ 金で釣る気はない

translation.en: Just gonna give it to ’em.
Most of it.
[sighs] See them once more, and then I’ll just--
No, you’re not.
You are going nowhere near those girls.
translation.ja: あの子たちに近づくな

translation.en: Money, no money, I don’t care. You will never be in proximity enough
translation.ja: 金があろうとなかろうと 関係ない

translation.en: that your damage and mayhem ever touches them, not even for a second.
translation.ja: 疫病神のお前が近づけば あの子たちが危険だ

translation.en: I promise this to you, Son. This will not happen if I am alive.
translation.ja: 俺の目の黒いうちは 決して そんなことさせん

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
I’m... sorry for everything.
No, you’re not listening.
I said it will not happen.
I said no.
Stop me.
